title: Uncle Si's New TV Role
description:
Si shares new details about the show he's working on with Jase and Jep. Martin, Stone, and John-David are in awe of Si's en-Si-clopedic knowledge of everything from giant parrots to penguin poop to constellations. Stone tells a story about Jase's incredible duck-tracking skills. We learn that Si is a BIG fan of Pink. And the boys finally answer the question of whether or not game wardens go to heaven.
-
